location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A postcard of the USS Nashville (CL-43), a light cruiser of the Brooklyn-class cruiser that was launched on 2 October 1937. This ship was sponsored by Misses Ann and Mildred Stahlman of Nashville, Tennessee and was commissioned on 6 June 1938, Captain William W. Wilson in command.[4]Forms part of the Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection. 1 postcard.

titleInfo.title: Ridley Wills II Nashville Postcards Collection
